title: Chicken and pineapple salad
ingredients: ['300g tinned pineapple rings', '250g smoked chicken, cubed', '150g grated hard cheese (such as mature Cheddar)', '100g walnuts, chopped', '2 tablespoons natural yoghurt or soured cream', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 cloves garlic, minced (optional)', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
